title: 新手第一次砌機 7k-8k list 求評

replies.msg:
多謝各位大佬比意見
CPU ：AMD Ryzen 5 1600
Motherboard： MSI B350M GAMING PRO
RAM ：Kingston HyperX Fury 16GB DDR4 2400 Memory Kit (8GB x2)
Display Card ： STRIX-GTX1060-6G-GAMING
HDD ：WD Blue WD10EZEX 1TB 7200RPM 3.5
SSD ：Samsung PM961 Polaris 256GB M.2 PCIe NVMe 3.0 x4

PSU 唔識揀
Case 未定

RAM有無其他推介？ 同埋係咪去新高登執就ok啦？
新高登賣二手嘢

新高登賣二手嘢

Ching 有咩好地點推薦

antec neo eco ii 550

antec neo eco ii 450 also fine but not recommended for any component upgrades

RAM:上3200

宜家已經7300左右了
無錢繼續加

antec neo eco ii 550

antec neo eco ii 450 also fine but not recommended for any component upgrades

one of my friend suggested that i should buy a 650w psu but is it possible for 450w?

antec neo eco ii 550

antec neo eco ii 450 also fine but not recommended for any component upgrades

one of my friend suggested that i should buy a 650w psu but is it possible for 450w?


I think so
Because I am using 450w for my r5 1600 and galax 1060 6gb
So far no any problem
But 550w is suggested if you are going to overclock

RAM:上3200

宜家已經7300左右了
無錢繼續加

Budget唔夠就唔好玩信仰囉

antec neo eco ii 550

antec neo eco ii 450 also fine but not recommended for any component upgrades

one of my friend suggested that i should buy a 650w psu but is it possible for 450w?


I think so
Because I am using 450w for my r5 1600 and galax 1060 6gb
So far no any problem
But 550w is suggested if you are going to overclock

thx a lot
But i am not going to oc as i am still a noob for it so i just need to buy a 450w or 550w right?
